citations.title: [GPTutor]( (arXiv, 2023): GPT-based programming tutor
[MathGPT]( (arXiv, 2023): Math tutoring with step-by-step solutions
[Teaching Models to Express Uncertainty]( (arXiv, 2022): Calibration techniques
[Calibrating LLMs with Human Feedback]( (arXiv, 2023): RLHF for calibration
[Conformal Prediction for LLMs]( (arXiv, 2023): Uncertainty quantification
[Khanmigo]( — GPT-4 tutor, but no explicit calibration
[Adaptive Tutoring Systems]( (User Modeling and User-Adapted Interaction, 2021) — Adaptive ITS, not LLM-based
[Metacognition in Learning]( (Psychological Bulletin, 2008) — Importance of metacognition
[AI Explanations and Trust]( (arXiv, 2023) — Confidence and user trust
[Human-AI Collaboration]( (arXiv, 2022) — General framework
[Hybrid Tutoring Systems]( (International Journal of Educational Technology, 2021)
[Culturally Responsive Teaching]( — Pedagogical framework
[AI and Educational Equity]( (Computers & Education, 2022)
1. **[Khanmigo: AI-Powered Tutor]( (Khan Academy, 2023) — GPT-4 tutoring, no explicit calibration
2. **[Teaching Models to Express Their Uncertainty]( (Lin et al., arXiv 2022) — Calibration methods for LLMs
3. **[GPTutor: Programming Tutor with GPT]( (Leinonen et al., arXiv 2023) — LLM tutoring for CS
4. **[Intelligent Tutoring Systems: A Comprehensive Historical Survey]( (Psotka & Mutter, User Modeling, 2021) — ITS overview
5. **[AI and Educational Equity]( (Holmes et al., Computers & Education, 2022) — Equity considerations
6. **[Metacognition and Learning]( (Dunlosky & Metcalfe, Psychological Bulletin, 2008) — Importance of metacognition
[NSF Cyberlearning Program]( — Funding opportunity
[IES Education Research Grants]( — Funding opportunity
